channel.title: Prunus Persica on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Prunus Persica on funPlantGenes

item.title: PpAAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.5G018200 Gene Symbol: PpAAT1 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpARF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.4G085900 Gene Symbol: PpARF6 Gene Name: auxin response factor 6 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpARF6 acts as an integrator of auxin and ethylene signaling to promote fruit ripening in peach.

item.title: PpB3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pp08G015510 Gene Symbol: PpB3-1 Gene Name: Genome: CN14 genome Species: Prunus persica Functional Description: PpB3-1, a candidate gene for flower type (SH) and flower size, contributed to petal development and promoted petal enlargement.

item.title: PpbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.8G157500 Gene Symbol: PpbHLH1 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpbZIP44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpbZIP44 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: A pear S1-bZIP transcription factor PpbZIP44 modulates carbohydrate metabolism, amino acid, and flavonoid accumulation in fruits.

item.title: PpCBF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpCBF1 Gene Name: C-repeat binding factor 1 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: The overexpression of a peach CBF (PpCBF1) gene in a transgenic line of own-rooted apple (Malus×domestica) M.

item.title: PpDAM6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.1G531700 Gene Symbol: PpDAM6 Gene Name: DORMANCY-ASSOCIATED MADS-box Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpDML1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.7G118000 Gene Symbol: PpDML1 Gene Name: DNA demethylase1 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PpNAC1 and DNA demethylase PpDML1 synergistically regulate peach fruit ripening.

item.title: PpeDAM6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpeDAM6 Gene Name: DORMANCY-ASSOCIATED MADS-BOX 6 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpeDAM6 overexpression in Arabidopsis induces an AGL24-like phenotype.

item.title: PpEG4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpEG4 Gene Name: endo-beta-1,4-glucanase Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpEG4 is a peach endo-beta-1,4-glucanase gene whose expression in climacteric peaches does not follow a climacteric pattern.

item.title: PpERF.A16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ppa008730m Gene Symbol: PpERF.A16 Gene Name: Genome: peach genome version 1.

item.title: PpERF1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe. 6G348700 Gene Symbol: PpERF1-1 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpERF1-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe. 8G224600 Gene Symbol: PpERF1-2 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.7G194400 Gene Symbol: PpERF3 Gene Name: ethylene response transcription factor 3 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpERF3 positively regulates ABA biosynthesis by activating PpNCED2/3 transcription during fruit ripening in peach.

item.title: PpERF98-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe. 8G224700 Gene Symbol: PpERF98-1 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpERF98-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe. 1G037800 Gene Symbol: PpERF98-2 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpFAD3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.6G056100 Gene Symbol: PpFAD3-1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Peach fruit PpNAC1 activates PpFAD3-1 transcription to provide ω-3 fatty acids for the synthesis of short-chain flavor volatiles.

item.title: PpINH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.5G112600 Gene Symbol: PpINH1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpINH1, an invertase inhibitor, interacts with vacuolar invertase PpVIN2 in regulating the chilling tolerance of peach fruit.

item.title: PpLMI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.7G121100 Gene Symbol: PpLMI1 Gene Name: LATE MERISTEM IDENTITY Genome: Peach v2.

item.title: PpMADS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.5G208400 Gene Symbol: PpMADS2 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpMAPKK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpMAPKK5 Gene Name: P. persica mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase 5 Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpMYB25
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.5G196100 Gene Symbol: PpMYB25 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpMYB26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.1G278200 Gene Symbol: PpMYB26 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpNAC.A59
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ppa008828m Gene Symbol: PpNAC.A59 Gene Name: Genome: peach genome version 1.

item.title: PpNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.4G187100 Gene Symbol: PpNAC1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PpNAC1 and DNA demethylase PpDML1 synergistically regulate peach fruit ripening.

item.title: PpOFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.6G290900 Gene Symbol: PpOFP1 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpPG21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: ppa006839m Gene Symbol: PpPG21 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: The downregulation of PpPG21 and PpPG22 expression in melting-flesh peach delays fruit softening and hinders texture changes by influencing pectin solubilization and depolymerization.

item.title: PpPG22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: ppa006857m Gene Symbol: PpPG22 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: The downregulation of PpPG21 and PpPG22 expression in melting-flesh peach delays fruit softening and hinders texture changes by influencing pectin solubilization and depolymerization.

item.title: PpSnRK1α
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpSnRK1α Gene Name: Prunus persica SnRK1α Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpSnRK1α overexpression lines have higher SnRK1 activity and increased salt tolerance.

item.title: PpSnRK1βγ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.6G323700 Gene Symbol: PpSnRK1βγ Gene Name: sucrose non-fermenting 1 related kinase Genome: reference peach genome (release version 2.

item.title: PpTCP20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.3G308700 Gene Symbol: PpTCP20 Gene Name: TCP transcription factor 20 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Isolated a TEOSINTE BRANCHED1/CYCLOIDEA/PROLIFERATING CELL FACTOR transcription factor, PpTCP20, in the peach cultivar ‘Zhongyou 4’ (Prunus persica var.

item.title: PpTGA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpTGA1 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpTIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pp03G006310 Gene Symbol: PpTIP2 Gene Name: aquaporin tonoplast intrinsic protein 2 Genome: CN14 genome Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: De novo chromosome-level genome of a semi-dwarf cultivar of Prunus persica identifies the aquaporin PpTIP2 as responsible for temperature-sensitive semi-dwarf trait and PpB3-1 for flower type and size.

item.title: PpTPS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.4G030400 Gene Symbol: PpTPS1 Gene Name: terpene synthase 1 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Heterologous expression in Escherichia coli and transient overexpression in tobacco and peach fruits showed PpTPS1 was localized in plastids and associated with production of linalool, while PpTPS2 was responsible for (E,E)-α-farnesene biosynthesis in the cytoplasm.

item.title: PpTPS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.4G029900 Gene Symbol: PpTPS2 Gene Name: terpene synthase 2 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Heterologous expression in Escherichia coli and transient overexpression in tobacco and peach fruits showed PpTPS1 was localized in plastids and associated with production of linalool, while PpTPS2 was responsible for (E,E)-α-farnesene biosynthesis in the cytoplasm.

item.title: PpTPS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.4G030300 Gene Symbol: PpTPS3 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PpVIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpVIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpINH1, an invertase inhibitor, interacts with vacuolar invertase PpVIN2 in regulating the chilling tolerance of peach fruit.

item.title: PpyABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpyABF3 Gene Name: ABRE-BINDING FACTOR3 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpyABF3 recruits the COMPASS-like complex to regulate bud dormancy maintenance via integrating ABA signaling and GA catabolism.

item.title: PpYUC11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: ppa008176m Gene Symbol: PpYUC11 Gene Name: YUCCA flavin mono-oxygenase11 Genome: Prunus persica v1.

item.title: PpYUC11-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.6G157500.1 Gene Symbol: PpYUC11-like Gene Name: YUCCA-like auxin-biosynthesis gene Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Integrative genomics approaches validate PpYUC11-like as candidate gene for the stony hard trait in peach.
